scripts.test: npm run test:setup && npm run test:standard
scripts.test:setup: CARGO_TARGET_DIR=../target cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && hc dna pack .. -o ../elemental-chat.dna && hc app pack .. -o ../elemental-chat.happ
scripts.test:behavior: TRYORAMA_CONDUCTOR_TIMEOUT_MS=1450000 TRYORAMA_LOG_LEVEL=info RUST_BACKTRACE=1 ts-node src/behaviors/index.ts | tap-diff
